DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study test whether Internet-based relapse prevention plus medication well protective effect compare medication , person residual depressive symptom currently pay employment education . We hypothesise two year follow intervention : - The person group receive Internet-based relapse prevention plus medication absent work few day due sick-leave compare medication-only group . - Fewer person group receive Internet-based relapse prevention + medication experience long term sick-leave ( 60 day ) compare medication-only group . - The person group receive Internet-based relapse prevention plus medication suffer few depressive relapse compare medication-only group . - At follow-up , person group receive Internet-based relapse prevention plus medication high health relate quality life low level depressive symptom compare medication-only group .
DOC.brief_title: Internetbased Relapse Prevention Partially Remitted Depression
DOC.criteria: Mild residual depressive symptom ( 719 MADRSS ) . A history least one episode Major Depression . Currently ( least ) halftime employment , selfemployment education . Taking stable ( since one month ) therapeutic dosage antidepressant medication Being able read write Swedish Having access internet Fulfilling criterion Major depression Psychosis Substance abuse Suicidality
